idea: SpiroAir is an organic air purifier using algae to scrub Co2 from ambient air and provide fresh oxygen rich air indoor.
name: SpiroAir

idea:
Harnessing flared natural gas and biogas by capturing it on remote sites using novel self developed proprietary technologies, transport it to the end user by virtual pipeline and use this gas for industrial purposes.

Our business model aims at increasing share of natural gas in India's energy mix and reducing pollution caused by gas flaring and waste from biomass.
name: LINK GAS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Societynmore (SNM) is an online Society Management & administration and Society Accounting solution which can be used by Cooperative/Commercial Societies to their benefit for effective administration of Society affairs.SNM provides a completely integrated software and mobile app based solutions for accounting, billing, management and communications for Housing Societies. SNM today works with over 250+ Housing Societies and covers more than 45,000+ users across multiple cities in India.
name: REMINDNMORE INFO.COM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Resha Technologies is developing a solar waste segregation technology and our manufacturing partner will provide the necessary equipment which will be scalable and modular. The facility will be designed such that all fixed and variable costs including plant machinery, utilities, manpower, consumables etc will be kept at a minimum.  The solar waste material will be collected from module manufacturers, project owners and test labs.  These waste generators are expected to pay a disposal fee for recycling similar to what they are paying now for simply disposing into landfill.  Recovered materials like glass, aluminum, copper, silicon, silver   will be sold to respective buyers.  A 500 TPA recycling unit is expected to generate a revenue of about INR 4 Crores per year. Resha Tech will start with an initial capacity of 500 TPA and slowly build capacity to reach 5000 TPA by 2025.  With further expansion through multiple recycling plants at strategic locations around the country we plan to build a total capacity of 20,000 TPA by 2030.  With our current estimate of revenue generated from sale of recovered materials and disposal fees, a 500 TPA plant will generate revenue of INR 4 Crores in 2020 reaching 40 Crores by 2025 and reaching 160 Crores by 2030 with a plan of 20,000 TPA.
name: Dr. Sarita Zele

idea:
FOODIES FAMILY is a small home based food delivery service owned by a son and mother. Willing to give their best home made delicacies to the society. Which is Rich in quality and taste. To develop a healthy society around and to change the eating habits of consumers. 

We are planning to make many take away and food delivery outlets for corporate employees, societies, schools by providing them the best quality food daily and make their health more nourishing
name: FOODIES FAMILY

idea: GrowinDad is an initiative for a healthier and happier generation of kids and families. We have observed that a father's presence or absence in a child's life causes a huge 'impact' on the child's character. And with the digital era of information access, this 'impact' does not need a huge boost to go on the darker side of the line. Here we bring across a table for father's to not only open up about their deepest insecurities but also to provide a boost through information exchange and various tips for parenting through our panel of experts.  To help become a better role model in the life of their kids.
name: GROWINDAD INFOMEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ASQUAREInfotech provides both computer products and services to make them useful to small business. We are especially focused on providing network systems and services to small and medium business. The systems include both PC-based LAN systems and minicomputer server-based systems. Our services include design and installation of network systems, training, and support.
name: ASQUAREInfotech

idea:
We are a social media solution that you can afford and most importantly trust.
By organizing the social media industry we are helping businesses find their identity online. We have broken down what it takes to create quality content and made it affordable so that every business no matter how small can find their place on social media.
name: CRAVE INFORMATION PRIVATE LIMITED
